mdRecord.dcterms:title: Old Fire Place in the Family Kitchen at Mt. Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, No. 317 Penn. Ave., Washington D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the fireplace and dining tables in the Kitchen at Mount Vernon. Mounted on orange board. The photographer's imprint on the front of the card reads, N. G. Johnson, Photographer, No. 317 Penn. Ave., Washington D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views. A preprinted label affixed to the reverse reads, Old Fire Place in the Family Kitchen at Mt. Vernon, Showing the old Crane, and low, Dutch range, etc., which show that the demands upon the cook were not limited in Washington's time. N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Outbuilding
